page.title: 03INDUSTRY IN EMSWORTH
page.content: One of the main industrial resources in{Emsworth}is fishing and seafood such as mussels and clams.Also the Public Houses are an expanding business.There are altogether eight Public Houses in {Emsworth}alone.There are about five Building Contractors, building has been an up and down business.Next to the other industries there is one that is growing day by day;that industry is ship building and repairs.Several years ago in{Emsworth} there were only three ship builders but now there about seven ship builders. Yet big international or national firms such as{I.B.M}or{Plessey,Racon or{Mellordata}software firm have not made big factories in{Emsworth},but small ones are expanding into large ones.
